stories.title: MongoDB shares jump as revenue growth accelerates

stories.text: I'm curious if there are paid programs for early-stage startups that you think are worth investing in? Especially for non-technical founders who want to meet technical people. I am aware of YC's Startup School (a great start), but I think paid programs are likely to have more direct mentorship, accountability, and community and those are valuable to me. On Deck now operates like YC - paying for equity, but programs like it? I'm especially interested in programs that foster non-traditional founders or ethical/social impact tech.
stories.title: Ask HN: Are any paid startup programs worth it?
